lines.text: I'm no man's burden! I want to be of use!
When the afternoon air currents mix, we can even touch the stars without fear!
Tidy up quickly and take that lunch box to Dad.

What do you mean by that tone? You're going to the library, right? Or shall I go instead? Then you can clean the toilet, the bathroom, and the entryway too, and go to the co-op for me. And take in the futons, do the shopping, and prepare dinner.
Shizuku, I just wanted to let you know I really liked your lyrics. You're a really talented writer.
Just the other day you said they were corny.
Oh, did I really say that?
Ha! You're forgetful too. See you later!
Look at her, my little warrior.

[speaking to The Baron]
Strange, its as if I have known you for a long time.
